name: FamilyChoreAssignments
0:
”Alexa, open family chore assignments”
”Alexa, ask family chore assignments to read my chore list”
”Alexa, ask family chore assignments to log a chore”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: family chore assignments
des:
Use this skill to keep track of chores that are assigned to each member of your household. You can ask Alexa to read the list of chores that are assigned to you each day, and you can log your chores as you complete them. Alexa automatically keeps score so you can complete with family members to see who finishes their chores first. Or last! The chore tracker automatically resets on Sunday each week.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
